content.description: Tricky start moving to match on a crimp ledge and bumping right up on the following two crimps, but after getting a high left toe the rest is smooth sailing.
content.protection: Definitely advise two pads and a spotter to avoid rolling into rocks below.
content.location: Begin with both hands at the base of the arete on the right side of the main face and then climb straight up using crimps to the right.

content.description: Could be hard to access during high tide, down climb off the back is around the high tide line. Looks like a giant egg from far away.
